verses.text: Know ye \w not|strong="G0050"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, (\w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* to them that \w know|strong="G1097"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*,) how \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* hath dominion \w over|strong="G2961"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w long|strong="G5550"\w* \w as|strong="G3745"\w* he \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w woman|strong="G1135"\w* which hath an \w husband|strong="G5220"\w* is \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* by the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w to|strong="G0435"\w* \add her\add* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* so long as he \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* be \w dead|strong="G0599"\w*, she is \w loosed|strong="G2673"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \add her\add* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*.

\w So|strong="G0686"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w*, \w while|strong="G2198"\w* \add her\add* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w*, she be \w married|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G0435"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, she shall be \w called|strong="G5537"\w* an \w adulteress|strong="G3428"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* her \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* be \w dead|strong="G0599"\w*, she \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w free|strong="G1658"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* that \w law|strong="G3551"\w*; so \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w she|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1511"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w adulteress|strong="G3428"\w*, though she be \w married|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G0435"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* are become \w dead|strong="G2289"\w* to the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* should be \w married|strong="G1096"\w* to \w another|strong="G2087"\w*, \add even\add* to him who is \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we should bring forth \w fruit|strong="G2592"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* we \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, the \w motions|strong="G3804"\w* of \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, did \w work|strong="G1754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* bring forth \w fruit|strong="G2592"\w* unto \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* we are \w delivered|strong="G2673"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, that being \w dead|strong="G0599"\w* \w wherein|strong="G1722"\w* we were \w held|strong="G2722"\w*; \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* should \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w newness|strong="G2538"\w* of \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \add in\add* the \w oldness|strong="G3821"\w* of the \w letter|strong="G1121"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* shall we \w say|strong="G2046"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*? \add Is\add* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*? God \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*. \w Nay|strong="G0235"\w*, I \w had|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w had|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w known|strong="G1492"\w* \w lust|strong="G1939"\w*, \w except|strong="G3361"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* had \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, Thou \w shalt|strong="G1937"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w covet|strong="G1937"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w taking|strong="G2983"\w* \w occasion|strong="G0874"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w*, \w wrought|strong="G2716"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w* all manner \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w concupiscence|strong="G1939"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \add was\add* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* was \w alive|strong="G2198"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w once|strong="G4218"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G2064"\w* the \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w revived|strong="G0326"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \add was ordained\add* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w I|strong="G3427"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \add to be\add* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w taking|strong="G2983"\w* \w occasion|strong="G0874"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w*, \w deceived|strong="G1818"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w slew|strong="G0615"\w* \add me\add*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \add is\add* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w just|strong="G1342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w*.

\w Was|strong="G1096"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* that which is \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* unto \w me|strong="G1698"\w*? God \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*. \w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it might \w appear|strong="G5316"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*, \w working|strong="G2716"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* in \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* that which is \w good|strong="G0018"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* might \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w exceeding|strong="G5236"\w* \w sinful|strong="G0268"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w carnal|strong="G4559"\w*, \w sold|strong="G4097"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* that \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w do|strong="G2716"\w* I \w allow|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* I \w would|strong="G2309"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* do \w I|strong="G4238"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* I \w hate|strong="G3404"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* do \w I|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* I \w do|strong="G4160"\w* that \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, I consent \w unto|strong="G4852"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \add it is\add* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G3570"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* it is no \w more|strong="G3765"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w that|strong="G3765"\w* \w do|strong="G2716"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* that \w dwelleth|strong="G3611"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w* (\w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*,) \w dwelleth|strong="G3611"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* good \w thing|strong="G0018"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* to \w will|strong="G2309"\w* is \w present|strong="G3873"\w* with \w me|strong="G3427"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \add how\add* to \w perform|strong="G2716"\w* that which is \w good|strong="G2570"\w* I \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* I \w would|strong="G2309"\w* I \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* I \w do|strong="G4238"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* I \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, it is no \w more|strong="G3765"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w that|strong="G3765"\w* \w do|strong="G2716"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* that \w dwelleth|strong="G3611"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*.

I \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w then|strong="G0686"\w* a \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w when|strong="G2309"\w* \w I|strong="G1698"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*, \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* is \w present|strong="G3873"\w* with \w me|strong="G1698"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w delight|strong="G4913"\w* in the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G0444"\w* \w inward|strong="G2080"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w see|strong="G0991"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w*, warring \w against|strong="G0497"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w of|strong="G3563"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bringing|strong="G0163"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* into \w captivity|strong="G0163"\w* to the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* which \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w*.

\w O|strong="G0444"\w* \w wretched|strong="G5005"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* that I \w am|strong="G1473"\w*! \w who|strong="G5101"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="G4506"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w of|strong="G2288"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*?

I \w thank|strong="G2168"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*. \w So|strong="G0686"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* with the \w mind|strong="G3563"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w myself|strong="G0846"\w* \w serve|strong="G1398"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* with the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.
